quote: Freedom itself demands discomfort. – Mark Manson
fact: The first episode of "Joanie Loves Chachi" was the highest rated American program in the history of Korean television, a country where "Chachi" translates to "penis".
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: I’m on a whiskey diet. I’ve lost three days already.
